text: "Only 12% of legal immigrants are selected based on skill or based on merit. In countries like Canada, Australia and New Zealand, and others, that number is closer to 60, and even 70 and 75% in some cases."
"Drug prices are coming down, first time in 51 years because of my administration."
Says Pennsylvania Republican nominee for Congress Fred Keller "was a 50-50 shot" before his landslide victory.
Says Joe Biden "deserted you. … I guess he was born here, but he left you, folks. He left you for another state."
"They didn’t even put up a fight against SALT"
"We will always protect patients with pre-existing conditions, very importantly."
Tariffs are "paid for mostly by China, by the way, not by us."
Democrats "don’t want money" to go to the Florida Panhandle for Hurricane Michael aid
"The unemployment rate for Wisconsin workers has reached historic lows. It’s never been this low before, ever, ever, ever."
"The poverty rate for Wisconsin families has reached the lowest rate in 22 years."
"We have been losing to China for many years, $500 billion a year.
The Russia investigation "was a coup. This was an attempted overthrow of the United States government."

With a late-term abortion, "the mother meets with the doctor. They take care of the baby, they wrap the baby beautifully. And then the doctor and the mother determine whether or not they will execute the baby."
"In the ‘old days’ if you were president and you had a good economy, you were basically immune from criticism."
"In New York State, Democrats blocked a Bill expanding College Tuition for Gold Star families after approving aid for illegal immigrants."
"The noise (from windmills) causes cancer."
Says his father, Fred Trump, was "born in a very wonderful place in Germany."
"Puerto Rico got 91 Billion Dollars for the hurricane, more money than has ever been gotten for a hurricane before."
"When the wind stops blowing, that’s the end of your electric."
"The FBI said (former national security adviser Michael Flynn) wasn't lying."
When Congress sought documents from President Barack Obama, the White House "didn’t do anything. They didn’t give one letter of the request. Many requests were made. They didn’t give a letter."
"The Democrat(ic) position on abortion is now so extreme that they don’t mind executing babies AFTER birth."
Says former Sen. Harry Reid "got thrown out."
"We have just built this powerful Wall in New Mexico. Completed on January 30, 2019 — 47 days ahead of schedule!"
Says Gov. Ralph Northam "stated that he would even allow a newborn baby to come out into the world... then talk to the mother and talk to the father and then execute the baby."
"Violent crime is now going down for the first time in a long while."
Says that at Beto O’Rourke’s rally in El Paso, there were "200 people, 300 people."

"The border city of El Paso, Texas, used to have extremely high rates of violent crime — one of the highest in the country, and considered one of our nation's most dangerous cities. Now, immediately upon its building, with a powerful barrier in place, El Paso is one of the safest cities in our country."
"The Dems and their committees are going ‘nuts.’ The Republicans never did this to President Obama."
San Diego’s border barrier "almost completely ended illegal crossings."
"58,000 non-citizens voted in Texas, with 95,000 non-citizens registered to vote."

"We are not even into February and the cost of illegal immigration so far this year is $18,959,495,168. Cost Friday was $603,331,392. There are at least 25,772,342 illegal aliens, not the 11,000,000 that have been reported for years, in our Country."
"One in three women is sexually assaulted on the dangerous journey north."
Says there’s "never (been) so many apprehensions ever in our history."
"When I say Mexico is going to pay for the wall, that's what I said. Mexico is going to pay. I didn't say they're going to write me a check for $20 billion or $10 billion."
California’s deadly wildfires "would never happen" with "proper Forest Management."
Says Sen. Charles Schumer "repeatedly supported a physical barrier in the past along with many other Democrats. They changed their mind only after I was elected president."
"At the request of Democrats, it will be a steel barrier rather than a concrete wall."
"The reason Russia was in Afghanistan was because terrorists were going into Russia."
"Mexico is paying for the Wall through the new USMCA Trade Deal."
Says troops recently received "one of the biggest pay raises" ever, and that it was the first pay increase in "more than 10 years."
"Russia, Iran, Syria & many others are not happy" about U.S. troops leaving Syria.
Says 19,000 text messages exchanged between former FBI officials that were "purposely and illegally deleted ... would have explained (the special counsel investigation) hoax."

Says the United States loses "250 Billion Dollars a year on illegal immigration, not including the terrible drug flow. Top Border Security, including a Wall, is $25 Billion. Pays for itself in two months."
Says of immigrant family separations at the border, "we had the exact same policy as the Obama administration."
Just before Thanksgiving, oil was $54 a barrel, down from $82. "Thank you to Saudi Arabia."
"If you buy, you know, a box of cereal, if you do anything, you have a voter ID. … The only thing you don’t is if you’re a voter of the United States."
"Even in California now, they don’t want to be sanctuary cities anymore. They want out."
"There is no reason for these massive, deadly and costly forest fires in California except that forest management is so poor."
"In the House, Republicans dramatically outperformed historical precedents."
"This election marks the largest Senate gains for a president's party in a first midterm election since at least President Kennedy's in 1962."
"The Democrat plan would just obliterate Medicare and terminate Medicare Advantage ... seniors who have been paying for this for years (and) will not be taken care of anymore."
"Democrats let him (cop killer Luis Bracamontes) into our country," and "Democrats let him stay."
"The Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan of illegal aliens into our country. And they want to sign them up for free health care, free welfare, free education, and for the right to vote."
"Household income among Hispanic Americans has just set a new record high."

Says "Bob Casey voted in favor of deadly sanctuary cities that released thousands upon thousands of illegal alien criminals and vicious gang members to prey on Pennsylvania streets, to prey all over this country."
"Democrats oppose any effort to secure our border."
Says he didn't cancel a political rally because after Sept. 11, "the New York Stock Exchange was open the following day."
Says Beto O’Rourke "voted to shield MS-13 gang members from deportation."
"Many presidents don’t get the chance to put a Supreme Court justice on."
"All across Ohio, steel mills are reopening."
Says a recent opioid bill that reached his desk had "very little Democrat support."
In California, "they're rioting now" over sanctuary cities.
Saudi Arabia has ordered $450 billion, "$110 billion of which is a military order," producing "over a million jobs."
"The poverty rates for African Americans and Hispanic Americans -- it’s been incredible, they’ve all reached their lowest levels in the history of our country."
Says Democrats "want to give (undocumented immigrants) cars."
"I have no financial interests in Saudi Arabia."
"Every single Democrat in the U.S. Senate has signed up for the open borders, and it's a bill, it's called the ‘open borders bill.’"
"Some of the Democrats have been talking about ending (coverage for) pre-existing conditions."
"The United States is now the No. 1 energy producer in the world. That happened just recently."
Says Sen. Richard Blumenthal said he served in Vietnam in "Da Nang Province. Soldiers dying left and right as we battled up the hill." And "then he cried when (the press) caught him."
Says Sen. Richard Blumenthal "lied about his service" in Vietnam.
Says Republicans "just passed" the Veterans Choice program after 44 years of trying. "They've been trying to pass that one for many, many decades."
"Since NAFTA’s adoption, the United States racked up trade deficits totaling more than $2 trillion."
Under the North American Free Trade Agreement, "we lost thousands of plants."
Under the North American Free Trade Agreement, "we lost millions of jobs."
On investigating during the Supreme Court confirmation process, "The FBI doesn’t do that."
Says 3,000 people "did not die" in two hurricanes that hit Puerto Rico. That death toll estimate was "done by Democrats."

"Puerto Rico’s electric grid and their electric generating plant was dead before the storms ever hit. It was in very bad shape. It was in bankruptcy. It had no money. It was largely -- you know, it was largely closed."
"When Abraham Lincoln made the Gettysburg Address speech, the great speech, do you know he was ridiculed? He was ridiculed."
"We’re making (Medicare) stronger. We’re making Social Security stronger."

"Someone can write an article or book, totally make up stories and form a picture of a person that is literally the exact opposite of the fact, and get away with it without retribution or cost. Don’t know why Washington politicians don’t change libel laws?"

"Two long running, Obama era, investigations of two very popular Republican Congressmen were brought to a well publicized charge, just ahead of the Mid-Terms, by the Jeff Sessions Justice Department."
"A few months ago, it hit where West Virginia is, on a per capita basis, one of the most successful (gross domestic product) states in our union."
Says "96 percent of (Google News) results on ‘Trump News’ are from National Left-Wing Media."
Says the "South African Government is now seizing land from white farmers" and alleges a "large scale killing of farmers" in the country.
"I want clean air. I want crystal clean water. And we’ve got it. We’ve got the cleanest country in the planet right now."
Says Ohio Gov. John Kasich is "very unpopular."
"Most of that money (made by the NFL) goes to the players."

"California wildfires are being magnified & made so much worse by the bad environmental laws which aren’t allowing massive amount of readily available water to be properly utilized. It is being diverted into the Pacific Ocean."
"U.S. Steel just announced that they are building six new steel mills."
"Collusion is not a crime."
"Wow, highest Poll Numbers in the history of the Republican Party. That includes Honest Abe Lincoln and Ronald Reagan."
"The price of soybeans has fallen 50% since 5 years before the election. A big reason is bad (terrible) trade deals with other countries."
Says the Steele dossier "was responsible for starting" Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s investigation into links between the Trump campaign and Russia.
"The Electoral College is much more advantageous for Democrats."
"The servers of the Pakistani gentleman that worked on the DNC" are "missing."
"The United States was paying for anywhere from 70 to 90 percent of (NATO), depending on the way you calculate."
"Many countries (in NATO) owe us a tremendous amount of money for many years back, where they’re delinquent, as far as I’m concerned, because the United States has had to pay for them."
"I have watched ICE liberate towns from the grasp of MS-13."
Sen. Kamala Harris is "supporting the animals of MS-13."
"Watch those GDP numbers. We started off at a very low number, and right now we hit a 3.2 (percent). Nobody thought that was possible."
"The European Union … they send us Mercedes, they send us -- by the millions -- the BMWs -- cars by the millions."
Says Wisconsin "hadn’t been won by a Republican since Dwight D. Eisenhower, in 1952. And I won Wisconsin. …  Ronald Reagan, remember, Wisconsin was the state that Ronald Reagan did not win."
"We’ve already started (the border wall). We started it in San Diego."
"There's been a 1,700 percent increase in asylum claims over the last 10 years."
"You can’t (end the separation of families at the border) through an executive order."
"Crime in Germany is way up."
Says Bill Clinton "spent $3 billion and got nothing. And (North Korea) started making nuclear weapons a day later."
"Canada charges the U.S. a 270% tariff on Dairy Products! They didn’t tell you that, did they? Not fair to our farmers!"
"101 utilities cut rates, credit GOP tax cuts."
Says that people "went out in their boats to watch" Hurricane Harvey.
Philadelphia Eagles players stayed "in the Locker Room for the playing of our our National Anthem" or were "kneeling."
Rep. Dan Donovan "voted for Tax Cuts"
"We got $6 billion for opioid and getting rid of that scourge that’s taking over our country. And the numbers are way down."
Speaking of immigration cases, says, "We have thousands of judges."

"The Failing @nytimes quotes ‘a senior White House official,’ who doesn’t exist, as saying ‘even if the meeting were reinstated, holding it on June 12 would be impossible, given the lack of time and the amount of planning needed.’ WRONG AGAIN! Use real people, not phony sources."
A "horrible law" requires that children be separated from their parents "once they cross the Border into the U.S."
"Democrats mistakenly tweet 2014 pictures from Obama’s term showing children from the Border in steel cages."
Says "Nancy Pelosi came out in favor of MS-13."
"Senator Cryin’ Chuck Schumer fought hard against the Bad Iran Deal, even going at it with President Obama, & then Voted AGAINST it! Now he says I should not have terminated the deal"
Says James Clapper said "that the FBI was spying on (Trump's) campaign."
The Mueller investigation is "soon to be $20,000,000."
Says of MS-13 gang members, "We are getting them out of our country by the thousands."
"In 2016, an officer was assaulted in America on an average of every 10 minutes."
A "catch and release" immigration policy "is a Democrat rule, Sherrod Brown, this is a Democrat rule."
Says the 2018 defense authorization bill includes raises for the military "for the first time in 10 years."
"I doubled my African-American poll numbers. We went from 11 to 22 in one week."
"In seven years that (nuclear) deal will have expired, and Iran is free to go ahead and create nuclear weapons."
"We have spent $7 trillion, trillion with a T, $7 trillion in the Middle East."
The nuclear deal gave Iran "$150 billion, giving $1.8 billion in cash — in actual cash carried out in barrels and in boxes from airplanes."

"Kanye (West) looks and he sees black unemployment at the lowest it’s been in the history of our country. He sees Hispanic unemployment at the lowest it’s been in the history of our country. He sees (women’s unemployment) the lowest it’s been in now almost 19 years."
Says North Korea has "agreed to denuclearization."
"James Comey Memos just out and show clearly that there was NO COLLUSION and NO OBSTRUCTION"
"The United States has a massive trade deficit with Japan. It's anywhere from $69 billion to a $100 billion a year."
EPA administrator Scott Pruitt's short-term rental "was about market rate."
Says Scott Pruitt’s security spending was "somewhat more" than his predecessor.
"When a car is sent to the United States from China, there is a Tariff to be paid of 2 1/2%. When a car is sent to China from the United States, there is a Tariff to be paid of 25%."

"This will be the last time — April — that you’re going to (fill out) that old-fashioned, big, lots of pages, complicated tax form. Because next April you’re going to, in many cases, (file) one page, one card. It’s going to be very, very different. Very, very different."

"In many places, like California, the same person votes many times. You probably heard about that. They always like to say 'oh that's a conspiracy theory.' Not a conspiracy theory, folks. Millions and millions of people."
"We’ve started building the wall."
Says caravans of people are coming to cross the Mexico-U.S. border.
Mexico has "very strong border laws -- ours are pathetic."
"Only fools, or worse, are saying that our money losing Post Office makes money with Amazon. THEY LOSE A FORTUNE, and this will be changed."
"Last year we lost $500 billion on trade with China."
Says Conor Lamb "ran on a campaign that said very nice things about me."
Robert Mueller’s investigative team has "13 hardened Democrats, some big Crooked Hillary supporters, and Zero Republicans."
Says Democratic obstruction is the reason why "many important positions in government are unfilled."
In Japan, "they take a bowling ball from 20 feet up in the air and they drop it on the hood of the car. And if the hood dents, then the car doesn't qualify...It's horrible, the way we're treated."
"We do have a Trade Deficit with Canada, as we do with almost all countries (some of them massive)."
Says China and Singapore impose the death penalty on drug dealers.
"The state of California is begging us to build walls in certain areas. They don’t tell you that."
Says the U.S. steel and aluminum industry is "a fraction of what it once was."
The last private rocket launch "cost $80 million. If the government did it, the same thing would have cost probably 40 or 50 times that amount of money. I mean, literally."
American aluminum and steel "are vital to our national security. ... They are the bedrock of our defense industrial base."
"When I was campaigning, I was talking about 18 and 20 years (when) wages effectively went down. Now, for the first time in a long time, they're starting to go up for people."
"Democrats are nowhere to be found on DACA."
The 2018 Academy Awards show was the "lowest rated Oscars in HISTORY."
"You take Pulse nightclub. If you had one person in that room that could carry a gun and knew how to use it, it wouldn’t have happened, or certainly to the extent that it did."
"I have been much tougher on Russia than Obama, just look at the facts. Total Fake News!"
"I never said Russia did not meddle in the election."
"The Democrats are pushing for Universal HealthCare while thousands of people are marching in the UK because their U system is going broke and not working."
Many gang members have taken advantage of "glaring loopholes and our laws to enter the country as illegal, unaccompanied, alien minors."

At the State of the Union address, Democrats, "even on positive news … were like death and un-American. Un-American. Somebody said, ‘treasonous.’ I mean, yeah, I guess, why not? Can we call that treason? Why not?"
"Instead of two for one, we have cut 22 burdensome regulations for everyone new rule."
"Consumer confidence, business confidence, and manufacturing confidence are the highest they have been in many decades."
"45.6 million people watched (the State of the Union), the highest number in history. @FoxNews beat every other Network, for the first time ever, with 11.7 million people tuning in."
"Apple has just announced it plans to invest a total of $350 billion in America, and hire another 20,000 workers."
"A single immigrant can bring in unlimited numbers of distant relatives."

"In the past, we have foolishly released hundreds and hundreds of dangerous terrorists, only to meet them again on the battlefield — including the ISIS leader, al-Baghdadi, who we captured, who we had, who we released."
"We are now, very proudly, an exporter of energy to the world."
Says one year later, "the coalition to defeat ISIS has liberated very close to 100 percent of the territory just recently held by these killers in Iraq and Syria."
"Small business confidence is at an all-time high."

"America is a nation of builders. We built the Empire State Building in just one year. Isn’t it a disgrace that it can now take 10 years just to get a minor permit approved for the building of a simple road?"
"After years of wage stagnation, we are finally seeing rising wages."
The immigration visa lottery "randomly hands out green cards without any regard for skill, merit, or the safety of American people."
"Since we passed tax cuts, over 3 million workers have gotten tax cut bonuses — many of them thousands and thousands of dollars."
"We enacted the biggest tax cuts and reforms in American history."
"Because of my policies, Black Unemployment has just been reported to be at the LOWEST RATE EVER RECORDED!"
"The ice caps were going to melt, they were going to be gone by now, but now they’re setting records, so okay, they’re at a record level."
Says "22 to 24 people" came into the United States due to family connection with suspect in the October 2017 New York City terror attack.
Mexico is "now rated the number one most dangerous country in the world."
"Current immigration policy imposes as much as $300 billion annually in net fiscal costs on U.S. taxpayers."
"Chrysler is leaving Mexico and moving back to Michigan."
In a government shutdown, "what they are really doing is shutting down our military."
Says the Obama administration "sold perhaps the best located and finest embassy in London ... only to build a new one in an off location for 1.2 billion dollars."
When President Barack Obama "signed the executive order (on DACA, he) actually said he doesn't have the right to do this."
The Dow Jones Industrial Average "jumped 1000 points in last 5 weeks, Record fastest 1000 point move in history."

"African American unemployment is the lowest ever recorded in our country. The Hispanic unemployment rate dropped a full point in the last year and is close to the lowest in recorded history. Dems did nothing for you but get your vote!"
"I authorized Zero access to White House (actually turned him down many times) for author of phony book! I never spoke to him for book."
"Mostly Democrat states refused to hand over data" that could show election fraud.
There is "substantial evidence of voter fraud."
The new tax law is "kicking the American economy into high gear with $5.5 trillion in tax cuts."
The Senate seat won in a special election by a Democrat had been "held for more than thirty years by Republicans."
Said Dianne Feinstein said "there is no collusion" between the Trump campaign and Russia.
"We have signed more legislation than anybody. We broke the record of Harry Truman."
"We essentially repealed Obamacare because we got rid of the individual mandate ... and that was a primary source of funding of Obamacare."
Says of the diversity visa lottery program, "they give us their worst people, they put them in a bin," and "the worst of the worst" are selected.
Missouri is one of "13 states this year have seen unemployment drop to the lowest levels in the history of their state."
"Black homeownership just hit the highest level it has ever been in the history of our country."
"We’re … getting into the pool of the 100 million people that are not working. That pool is now coming back."
The Jerusalem Embassy Act "passed Congress by an overwhelming bipartisan majority and was reaffirmed by a unanimous vote of the Senate only six months ago."
"Hillary Clinton lied many times to the FBI."
Says the tax bill "is going to cost me a fortune, this thing -- believe me. Believe me, this is not good for me."
"For years, they have not been able to get tax cuts -- many, many years, since Reagan."
Says Joe Scarborough is party to an "unsolved mystery" from his time as a congressman in Florida.
Says Alabama Senate candidate Doug Jones "wants to raise taxes."
Says the individual mandate is "highly unpopular."
Chicago is "the city with the strongest gun laws in our nation."
"Coal production up 7.8% in past year. Down 31.5% last 10 years. #endingwaroncoal."
Says the diversity visa lottery program is "a Chuck Schumer beauty."
Says Paul Manafort’s alleged crimes were "years ago, before Paul Manafort was part of the Trump campaign."
"We have done more in eight months than the previous administration has done in many years" against ISIS.
Says the GOP plan he supports is "the biggest tax cut in U.S. history."
Says "46 percent of people believe major national news organizations fabricate stories about me."
Insurance companies "have made a fortune with Obamacare."
"We're the highest developed nation taxed in the world."
"The cost-sharing reductions (were) a gift (that) they gave the insurance companies."
The NFL is "getting massive tax breaks."
The Obama administration "borrowed more than $10 trillion, right? And yet, we picked up $5.2 trillion just in the stock market. ... Maybe in a sense we’re reducing debt."
"Bob Corker gave us the Iran Deal."
"Loopholes in current law prevent ‘Unaccompanied Alien Children’ (UACs) that arrive in the country illegally from being removed."
In the Alabama Senate runoff, "the candidate I endorsed (Luther Strange) went up MANY points after endorsement!"
Says "No, I don't benefit, I don't benefit" from his tax proposal.
Ending the estate tax would "protect millions of small businesses and the American farmer."
"We have one senator who’s a ‘yes’ vote ... but he’s in the hospital. And he’s a ‘yes’ vote. So we can’t do it by Friday. So we have the votes" to pass a health care bill.

"So now they take drugs, literally, and they throw it, a hundred pounds of drugs. They throw it over the wall, they have catapults, but they throw it over the wall, and it lands and it hits somebody on the head."
"NFL attendance and ratings are WAY DOWN. Boring games yes, but many stay away because they love our country."
The Graham-Cassidy health care bill does "include coverage of pre-existing conditions."
"Companies are moving back, creating job growth the likes of which our country has not seen in a very long time."
"Long gas lines forming in North Korea."
Says "92 percent of the people agree on DACA."
"In 1986, President Ronald Reagan" cut the business tax rate to 34 percent and "it worked -- our economy boomed, the middle class thrived and median family income increased."
"We stopped traffic coming through -- 78 percent."
"We have become an energy exporter for the first time ever just recently."
"There aren't too many people outside protesting" his speech at the Phoenix Convention Center.
White nationalist protesters in Charlottesville "had a permit. The other group didn’t have a permit."
"Study what General Pershing of the United States did to terrorists when caught. There was no more Radical Islamic Terror for 35 years!"
Wages "haven’t gone up for a long time."
"At the end of 2016, there were 23 percent fewer federal prosecutions than in 2011, so (prosecutors) looked at this scourge (opioid deaths) and they let it go by."
"My first order as president was to renovate and modernize our nuclear arsenal. It is now far stronger and more powerful than ever before."
Says his time away from Washington coincides with a "long planned renovation" for the White House.
"United Nations Resolution is the single largest economic sanctions package ever on North Korea. Over one billion dollars in cost to N.K."

Untaxed corporate earnings used to be "$2.5 trillion … I guess it’s $5 trillion now. Whatever it is, it’s a lot more. So we have anywhere from 4 (trillion) to 5 or even more trillions of dollars sitting offshore."
"The border is down 78 percent. Under past administrations, the border didn’t go down -- it went up."
"Corporations have NEVER made as much money as they are making now."
"Business spirit is the highest it's ever been, according to polls."
"We've achieved a historic increase in defense spending to get our troops the support they so richly deserve."
Amazon has a "no-tax monopoly."
"We had the best jobs report in 16 years."
"The person in charge of the Hillary investigation, Andrew McCabe, got $700,000 from (Hillary Clinton) for wife!"
During the Nixon Watergate investigation, "out of courtesy, the FBI started reporting to the Department of Justice. But there was nothing official."
"We’ve signed more bills -- and I’m talking about through the legislature -- than any president ever."

"I've gotten rid of the Johnson Amendment … I signed an executive order so that now ... ministers and and preachers and rabbis and whoever it may be, they can speak. You know, you couldn’t speak politically before, now you can."
Says his job approval poll numbers are "not bad" relative to other presidents at this point in his presidency.
Says John Podesta "refused to give the DNC server to the FBI and the CIA. Disgraceful!"
Says Barack Obama found out about Russia "in August. Now, the election was in November. That's a lot of time. He did nothing about it."
"Gas prices are the lowest in the U.S. in over ten years!"
CNN’s ratings are "way down."
"We're pretty much at the 50 percent mark" on deportations of MS-13 gang members.

"When Obamacare was signed into law, CBO estimated that 23 million people would be covered in Obamacare’s exchanges in 2017. They were off by more than 100 percent. Only 10.3 million people are covered by Obamacare."
"I can say that the people that have been hired (for the independent Russia investigation) are all Hillary Clinton supporters, some of them worked for Hillary Clinton."
Obamacare has led to fewer health insurance options for millions of Americans.
Says Jon Ossoff "doesn't even live in (his) district."
"The new Rasmussen Poll, one of the most accurate in the 2016 Election, just out with a Trump 50% Approval Rating. That's higher than O's #'s!"
"Obamacare premiums have doubled" in Wisconsin.
"Two million more people just dropped out of Obamacare. It is in a death spiral."
Rare is the president "who's passed more legislation, who's done more things than what we've done, between the executive orders and the job-killing regulations that have been terminated."
"China will be allowed to build hundreds of additional coal plants. So we can’t build the plants, but they can, according to this (Paris) agreement."
"At least 7 dead and 48 wounded in terror attack and Mayor of London says there is ‘no reason to be alarmed!’ "
Deals struck on his first foreign trip as president made and saved "millions of jobs."
"I’m proud to say that under my administration, as you just heard, we will be building the first new heavy icebreakers the United States has seen in over 40 years."
The federal tax code includes "deductions for birds flying across America."
Says James Clapper "and virtually everyone else" said "there is no collusion" in the Russia investigation findings.
"This Russia thing with Trump and Russia is a made-up story. It's an excuse by the Democrats for having lost an election that they should've won."
"Dems want billions to go to Insurance Companies to bail out donors"
"General Flynn got his clearance from the Obama administration."
Says of the GOP health care proposal, "pre-existing conditions are in the bill."
"For the first time in the modern political era, we have confirmed a new justice in the first 100 days."
"The U.S. recorded its slowest economic growth in five years (2016). GDP up only 1.6%. Trade deficits hurt the economy very badly."
Says he created "over 500,000 new jobs -- with a surge in female employment last month."
The Ninth Circuit has an overturned record "close to 80%."
"Back when they did NATO, there was no such thing as terrorism."
Illegal immigration on the U.S.-Mexico border is "the lowest in 17 years."
"No administration has accomplished more in the first 90 days."
"All pipelines that are coming into this country from now on has to be American steel."
With North Korea, "nobody has ever seen such a positive response on our behalf from China."
"We’ve lost 70,000 factories since China joined the World Trade Organization."
"The weak illegal immigration policies of the Obama Admin. allowed bad MS 13 gangs to form in cities across U.S. We are removing them fast!"
Says Jon Ossoff wants to "allow illegal immigration."
On whether NATO is "obsolete."
Before the presidential campaign, "I didn't know Steve (Bannon)."
"Last month, we saw a 64 percent reduction in illegal immigration on our southern border."
"I've won awards on environmental protection."
"There was a very large infrastructure bill that was approved during the Obama administration, a trillion dollars. Nobody ever saw anything being built."
"When you look for a job, you can't find it and you give up. You are now considered statistically employed."
"Since China joined — that’s another beauty — the WTO in 2001, the U.S. has lost many more than 60,000 factories."
"Since the day of my election, we've already cut illegal immigration at the southern border by 61 percent."
"The NSA and FBI tell Congress that Russia did not influence electoral process."
"Germany owes ... vast sums of money to NATO & the United States must be paid more for the powerful, and very expensive, defense it provides to Germany!"
Says "the New York Times wrote about" Barack Obama wiretapping Donald Trump during the election.
